amendment.description: An amendment numbered 94 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Office of Medical Policy at the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 271 (Roll no. 426).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 271 (Roll no. 426).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
